title: Google Android Pixel Security Update - Mar. 2020
content:
Hello Pixel Community,

We have provided the monthly Android/Pixel update for March 2020. All supported Pixel devices running Android 10 will receive these software updates as part of the March 2020 OTA, which begins rolling out to users today. We encourage you to check your Android version and update to receive the latest features. For more information on our new features, please visit here.

Overview : 
Build Number: 
Pixel 2 (XL): QQ2A.200305.002
Pixel 3 (XL): QQ2A.200305.002
Pixel 3a (XL): QQ2A.200305.002
Pixel 4 (XL):
Global: QQ2A.200305.003
AT&T: QQ2A.200305.004.A1
Notable fixes & improvements: 


The OTA update will roll out in phases depending on carrier and device. Users will receive a notification once it becomes available.

Details of the security fixes for this month can be found at this link: 
https://source.android.com/security/bulletin

Thanks,
Google Pixel Support Team
